website_summaries.verdict: A powerhouse mixer with one major flaw: the five-minute limit, which can alter the consistency of some recipes (butter cream, whipped cream, etc.)
pros: High wattage (700) great for heavier and stickier recipes
cons: Attachment access can be difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality, Circuit board burnt because of bad soldering, can cause fire
customer_reviews.author: georgiy astvatsaturov

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit
customer_reviews.text: The bowl of this mixer has a handle. The weld on the handle was bad - was not connected on top. I figured that I could get the bowl replaced. I tried to call Bodum - no phone. emailed them twice - NO RESPONSE. I returned the Bodum Mixer to Amazon and purchased a Kitchen Aid (designed and Assembled in America). I was perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mad scientist

customer_reviews.title: flawed in it's design
customer_reviews.text: BODUM 11514-10 Bistro Stand Meat Grinder Attachment is flawed in it's design. The entire attachment relies on one small red tab made of plastic which breaks too easy. We love the rest of the products but have already bought the replacement part twice now at $15 each. Time to buy a separate grinder.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette thomas

customer_reviews.title: unlike the kitchen aid version of mixer attachments, these ...
customer_reviews.text: unlike the kitchen aid version of mixer attachments, these do not stack. they take up a lot of storage spaces. the attachments also are not as straightforward; it has 4 separated parts to build the final working shredder: a plastic secure ring to lock it, a pusher, the transparent container, the grater cylinder itself. kitchen aid mixer's version only needs 2 to work, just the base attachment and a rotor cone, and they can be stored stacked together. the K.Aid design is more elegant. unless i am the one who unloads the dishwasher, someone else always get confused about those little assembly parts, and put them in separated places.
customer_reviews.author: K Hester

customer_reviews.title: Knee dough mixer review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since almost 2 years and just thought of writing an honest review to help people make a right decision when considering buying this. I use to hate making flat bread because i use to manually make the dough. With this i can have the dough ready in 3 minutes. Super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: TOM CURRAN

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase thus far
customer_reviews.text: Bought mixer and 2 sets of attachments. So far, so good. Much cheaper that other well known brand (ever though Amazon dropped the price after I bought it on one of their "deals"). The slicer attachment does cheese great but the meats came out very uneven. The grater worked fantastic. Haven't mixed bread yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable alternative to the expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... if your wife likes kitchen gadgets but never actually uses them, then this is a great idea, since it's extremely affordable. It actually works very well. It's almost certainly not as study as the more expensive brands, but if you don't use it heavily, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The noisiest mixer i have ever come across. Very slow top speed. Takes forever to mix. Wish I had returned it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but makes life easy. I am all for products that help simplify ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. A bit noisy, but makes life easy. I am all for products that help simplify life. Great job BODUM.
customer_reviews.author: UVISH99

customer_reviews.title: love this mixer
customer_reviews.text: love this mixer. My old sunbeam died lol and looked for the right replacement. This is it! Works great and the handle on the bowl is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patti F.

customer_reviews.title: making fried bread
customer_reviews.text: louder than i thought it would be.I hope its the gears working for me l like to make fried bread bread (its a very stiff dough) it gets it close to what i need so Im OK so for now
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: very simple & easy
customer_reviews.text: very simple & easy than other stand mixer slicer/shredder attachment.
customer_reviews.author: supbaby

customer_reviews.title: lots of power and solid
customer_reviews.text: ... nice , full of power and very solid machine, look its design !! The price was very affordable , and the name is very good covered and sponsored with the German technology. Proud of have one
customer_reviews.author: newton a banegas

customer_reviews.title: Little thing does big
customer_reviews.text: spent $200 on a meat grinder, but broken on the second use. This little thing does not take much room in the storage, but did the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jie Cai

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great mixer!
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is everything I expected and more! Looks great on the counter and works like a charm. Glad I got the Bodum instead of a KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: Aritschfox

customer_reviews.title: Wife says this was a great Christmas gift because it's so much better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife says this was a great Christmas gift because it's so much better than the competition. I'm still waiting for some tasty goodness, but I have high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Long

customer_reviews.title: Pretty I Guess
customer_reviews.text: Pretty for sure, but hardly any space to put in things while blending... and pretty much have you use the bowl cover and chute. Other than that, it does a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: j0hnnya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MIXER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MIXER. IT IS LOUD LIKE ALL THE OTHERS SAY BUT WHO CARES NOT ON ALL DAY! GREAT POWER! DO WISH THERE WAS A WAY TO PUT THE SPILL COVER ON AFTER THE TOOLS WERE ALREADY ON.
customer_reviews.author: lora craig

customer_reviews.title: We called Bodum directly and the service was extremely poor. We packed the product back up in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped very quickly. After setting up the mixer and checking the instructions, IT DID NOT WORK. We called Bodum directly and the service was extremely poor. We packed the product back up in the original box, and sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: bodum mixer is great!
customer_reviews.text: It has the power to mix all I need and cleans up so easy. I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: PL Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING GRACE - HOW SWEET THE SOUND OF THE MIXER WHEN IT IS NOT HAND HELD AND I CAN DO SOMETHING ELSE WHILE MY INGRIEDENTS MIX TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcard

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The main bummer on this item is it doesn't reach the side, the side of the bowl has to be scraped down constantly, i'd say at least 1/4 -1/3 of an inch won't mix in all around all surfaces of the bowl. It doesn't go fast enough to whip eggs or whipped creme. I wanted one of these for years and shopped carefully so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover your ears!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because it has a 700HP motor, which is more power than any other machine I researched. What I didn't realize, which was not anywhere in the description either, this puppy sounds like a Mack truck! It is so loud! It gets the job done, but wear your hearing protective gear!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Useful attachment!
customer_reviews.text: For $10, you get meat mincer, work just fine with the stand mixer what else can you complain.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lu

customer_reviews.title: Good Salsa Maker
customer_reviews.text: very diapointing if you were buying this grind meat. Blades seem very dull and just tears at the meat. Unit also gets clogged very easily. If you were grinding tomatoes it may be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love it .
customer_reviews.text: Used it tonight to great parmasan, Romano and asiago cheeses. Love it. Heavy duty. Easy to clean. Great pricing .
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been considering a different brand name, but am very happy with this one. Lots of power, I just need to experiment with the different speeds to get it right, but I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about a few bad reviews I was reading about it but nope it's ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas and I LOVEEE it !!!! I was worried about a few bad reviews I was reading about it but nope it's perfect !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine all the time. It works exactly as it should. It's a great comparable to the other products of its kind.
customer_reviews.author: RogersSBG

customer_reviews.title: I received one, and then followed up with U-Tube reviews before retuning it.
customer_reviews.text: I received one, and then followed up with U-Tube reviews before retuning it. It is pretty, but too light and "Plastic-ie" . It is made in China. I replaced it with a Kitchen Aid thru Costco. Cuisinart and Breville are also superior. I did not use it.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just want to say from the outset that the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, was the price of the attachments. I want them, but will only buy them when they are more affordable. With that out of the way, I made all of my Christmas cookies with no problem. I love the looks and the attachments change out easily with removing the splashgarud. Very happy I chose this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: My new bosun mixer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It is all it is advertised to be and more. I am impressed with how much power it has,the suction to stay in place on the counter and all the utensils it came with. I would recommend it to anyone. I also like the modern design it has.
customer_reviews.author: sharron

customer_reviews.title: With first time use this product seemed like it was loose
customer_reviews.text: With first time use this product seemed like it was loose. The top half shimmied around very hard while mixing, I thought it was going to break. Will be exchanging or returning.
customer_reviews.author: Karra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The purchase were as expected except for voltage it works on 110V not 220 v I used transformer for running it
customer_reviews.author: Khamis A.

customer_reviews.title: Wife doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: This machine works fine. However the wife doesn't like it because she thinks the motor is ta little too noisy
customer_reviews.author: Sze S. Tien

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A really good unit for the price. Suction base works great on our counters. Pretty noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Maniac

product_meta.title: BODUM 11381-01US Bistro 700W 7-Speed Tilt-Head Stand Mixer with Pouring Shield, 5-Quart, 4.7-Litter, Stainless Steel Bowl, Beaters, Whisk, Dough Hook, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Stand MixerThe attractive Bistro stand mixer is a handsome addition to any kitchen. A powerful 700-watt, 7 speed motor delivers up to twice the power of traditional stand mixers to tackle all your mixing needs. It features large, stainless steel mixing bowls with a rubber-covered handle for easy pouring and carrying. The splash-guard can be removed effortlessly and has a funnel attachment for easy addition of ingredients while operating. Attachments include a beater, a whisk and a non-stick dough hook. Additional attachments are sold separately. Easy to use with a lift-assist mixer head which locks into place and a rotating attachment head which maximizes mixing.
feature_bullets: 5-Quart bowl and attachments are dishwasher safe
On-board attachment storage keeps accessories at your fingertips
Suction cup base keep the mixer stable and secure on the counter while mixing
Space saving low profile Fits on more countertops; stores easily under the counter with its compact size (9.25"X15.75"X13.6")

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
